experiences.title: Software Developer Co-op
bulletpoints: Developed the Next.js (TypeScript) front-end of a radiation dosimetry QA Website, by collaborating with the UI/UX design team in an agile environment, facilitating critical business operations for 300 daily users
Improved data verification user experience by designing an interactive 3D scatter plot graph with Three.js
Developed a front-end desktop (C#, WPF) application to support the development of RF scanners
Designed various components (TypeScript) for a Angular-based NativeScript mobile application used to visualize Seismic Activity

experiences.title: Telecom Technical Officer Co-op
experiences.companyTitle: Innovation, Science, and Economic Development (ISED) Canada
bulletpoints: Developed dynamic application forms for the Universal Broadband Fund using VB with a focus on re-usability for future funds and simplicity for user experience
Reduced funding applicant form generation time by 32% by optimizing SQL queries, eliminating redundant statements, and minimizing the amount of database connections
Developed a task management system in VB and SQL for a 12-member team, integrating 3 databases, which optimized workload distribution and project management by balancing future tasks

experiences.title: Telecom Technical Officer Co-op
experiences.companyTitle: Innovation, Science, and Economic Development (ISED) Canada
bulletpoints: Conducted environmental, risk, and technical assessments on 10 different telecom systems to ascertain funding eligibility for the Universal Broadband Fund, ensuring compliance and accuracy
Designed a variety of agreements and application forms (VB, Microsoft Office) in an agile environment to enable accurate assessment of funding applicants

experiences.title: Application Support Services Intern
bulletpoints: Developed a script (PowerShell) to perform ServiceNow ticket processing, reducing ticket escalation time by 67%
Automated daily on-boarding and off-boarding process, eliminating manual script execution and necessary supervision
